name: Immersion
description: In this game you have to try on the role of a brave Explorer of the deep sea. Armed with a harpoon, go down into the depths of unexplored underwater caves in search of lost wealth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 2 GB available space
